features: 99% Water, Plant-based multi-tasking Wipes clean effectively while giving skin a little extra love
Naturally scented; Extra-large, thick + soft; Cruelty free; Dermatologist tested
Nourish + Cleanse: made with Jojoba + Almond Oil to nourish; Hydrate + Cleanse: made with Aloe + Cucumber to hydrate; Calm + Cleanse: made with Aloe + Lavender to promote calmness

body.description: Infused with skin nourishing ingredients + natural fragrance, our 99% water, plant-based wipes clean effectively while giving skin a little extra love. Plus, they smell amazing! Use them for the whole fam — from gently cleansing your hands on-the-go or freshening up post-workout, to cleaning kiddos' messy faces, hands and tushies! Keep them in the car for sticky snacks, in your work out bag for a quick refresh, and in all the rooms of your home for easy access to these multitasking wipes we love!NOURISH + CLEANSE:Our Nourish + Cleanse wipes are made with jojoba + almond oil to nourish skin, and the dreamy natural sweet almond scent uplifts spirits.HYDRATE + CLEANSE:Our Hydrate + Cleanse wipes are made with aloe + cucumber to hydrate skin. The natural aloe water scent is light and gentle, sure to make your cleansing experience so refreshing!CALM + CLEANSE:Our Calm + Cleanse wipes are made with naturally derived lavender + aloe to bring serene vibes to you + babe. Perfect for use before naps, bedtime, or anytime the fam needs some calm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These wipes work really great for really anything. You can add a little rubbing alcohol to one wipe to turn it into a disinfectant wipe to disinfect any surface that you want. On top of that you can use it for private areas to keep extra clean, or even as a makeup removal wipe as they have simple and honest ingredients to where they do not bother sensitive skin as I have very sensitive skin and it is very hard to find a wipe that does not bother my skin. These wipes are also great for cleaning up if you spray a surface and use them after to wipe the area, they are great for wiping your car or wiping up small messes around you. I love the fact that they just say honest on them and not baby wipes so it doesn't look like you're carrying around baby wipes for a baby when you don't have a baby! As an adult female you tend to need something to clean up after yourself even though you're not a baby, they are great for those menstrual cycle times as long as you don't flush them in the toilet of course, they are also great for wiping your hands and really for anything. I only wish buying a big pack of them was not as expensive as they are somewhat difficult to afford.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these wipes
reviews.reviewText: Wipes worked great, soft and easy on our newborn!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product quality.
reviews.reviewText: Having very oily skin I wanted a facial wipe that was good quality to freshen up while out and about. Another brand I was using always left lint on my face after using, embarrassing seeing yourself in a mirror after walking around like that! I think the cost is very reasonable for what you are getting. Nice packaging and a durable wipe. The wipes have just the right amount of ingredients on them to not make your face really wet and sticky.Charlie B.Chelsea, Massachusetts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I did love them they are soft strong the smell is mild so really good for everyday use with sensitive skin I highly recommend plus was really cost friendly for the full packet they did go a long ways

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars High quality wipes that clean well
reviews.reviewText: I wear make up and do my best to take it off each night before I sleep. Sometimes I get lazy to wash it off, so I resort to wipes to do the job. When I do wash my face, there will be some residue around the perimeter of my face, so using a wipe to wipe off the excess make up has been helpful. I used to use Burt’s bees wipes but didn’t like them as much and couldn’t find a value back that was economical to keep on purchasing. I discovered the honest wipes several months back and continue to purchase them. I like that they aren’t drying and they do a decent good job of cleaning the face. The only thing I dislike is that I have to use wipes in the first place because it can be wasteful and costly to keep buying them but I try to use them sparingly as needed. I am also very sensitive to smells and these wipes don’t bother me one bit. Happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I read a lot of reviews regarding the foul odor of these. I do notice that after washing my face there is a mildly unpleasant but mostly neutral odor. However, that "negative" is immediately countered by several things;-They clean very well. Picking up grease, dirt, grim, etc. (They aren't great at mechanical or car grease that you might get on your hands)-The number of towels is great. I'll never run out.-The moisture lid works surprisingly well(even after I broke it)-They are sturdy and don't tear very easily(definitely NOT flushable)Overall 4.5/5

reviews.reviewerName: Worked well for my application. It is essentially a coiled price of metal so be careful. It has A LOT of force.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These wipes are great!
reviews.reviewText: They work as intended and are on the softer side but don't pile. I really like the fact that they don't just fall apart when you wipe your face especially on clients with stubble or facial hair. I'd recommend these to any makeup artist looking for a cheap crudity free wipe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good smell & for the skin but left pieces of the wipes on baby's bottom
